title: How do I play music in the background, exit music, and synchronize lyrics?
answer:
l   To play music in the background, touch **Music**, play a song, and touch Back key or the Home key.  


 l   To exit music, on the music playing screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45339) > **Exit** > **OK**. 

 l   If a song and its lyrics are saved in the same directory on your phone, the lyrics are automatically loaded when you play the song. You can flick your finger across the music playing screen to view the lyrics.
